channel.title: The Happy Wife: Classic Sinai Podcast
channel.itunes:description: Jewish audio mp3s for the curious mind.
channel.itunes:author: Aryeh Pamensky
channel.description: Aryeh Pamensky's genius story-telling and fantastic humor is guaranteed to alter your current opinion of marriage, and help you to laugh your way through all your 'marital mousetraps.'
